page.title: 08VALE OF CLWYD RACING STABLES
page.content: At this 550 acre farm,in addition to cattle and sheep{,race horses}are bred and trained.10 horses are now in training.An early start is needed,25 horses,including foals are fed and watered 3 times daily.Staff clean out stables.The rest of the morning,about 2 hrs,is spent in schooling horses and exercising them.During the afternoon general maintenance work is done,steeplechase fencing may be inspected and repaired.Owners may call for a report on the progress of their horse.Horse sales are visited to look for good potential.On the breeding side,a mare may have to be sent to stud.Also horses which are racing are sent the day before if the journey to the course exceeds 100 miles. { { { {
